DOC.brief_summary: The Ahmanson-UCLA Cardiomyopathy Center conduct clinical research study ass use medication metformin improve quality life , exercise capacity , improve outcome heart failure patient pre-DM early DM ( type II ) . If patient participates study , patient receive drug metformin approximately 3 month . During study patient undergo comprehensive test include blood draw echocardiogram . The patient also fill questionnaire . The patient must 18 year old participate .
